channel.title: Home of US Soccer Support in Las Vegas
channel.description: Home of US Soccer Support in Las Vegas

item.title: USMNT vs Iceland at the StubHub Center
item.description:
USMNT vs Iceland at the StubHub Center

It has been announced that the USMNT will be playing Iceland as a warm up for the World Cup Qualifying matches starting next year.  The best part about this is that its only 4.5 hours away from Las Vegas so if you want to car pool its definitely possible.

item.title: USMNT & USWNT Watch Parties
item.description:
USMNT & USWNT Watch Parties

Your home for all AO Vegas watch parties is McMullan's Irish Pub.  We recommend getting there at least 15 minutes before the match starts, unless its a World Cup related match and then you'll likely need to be there a few hours early.  Beer specials are typically on Dale's Pale Ale, but can vary from match to match.
